title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via npm.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama gives synchronous & async APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, settings) packaged as a Docker container.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama; gem install ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and shortcuts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await and streaming; NuGet package OllamaSharp.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, and GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLMs via Ollama for note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: Lightweight FastAPI wrapper around Ollama that adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama; go get github.com/ollama/ollama-go.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration that injects Ollama service beans into your app.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official NPM package providing JavaScript bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python integration with Ollama.

title: reddit/r/ollama
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and ecosystem announcements.
